userreviews.userReview: This book has helped me a lot in terms of motivation. My favourite part is the Radical Thoughts on Motivation section. I go back to it from time to time and read them again to give myself a little jolt of inspiration. One thing I will say is that it does not help you find out what your purpose it, but if you have an idea about what your passions are if can really push you forward from that starting point. I highly recommend this book.

description: Tired of looking for motivation outside of yourself?Disappointed when you don't 'feel' motivated to build your dream life?This book shows you another way to go about it. The source of real motivation comes from inside you and you can draw from this source to get everything you want in life. The author shows you how to do that in practical actionable steps with the 8 pillars. **Inside, the author invites you to her FREE 21-Step Confidence Building program as a special reader gift.**The book shows you how to tap into your motivation source, and why that is the key to finding your life purpose and exactly how you can end your obsessive goal-setting (and failing) patterns and move effortlessly towards your desires.When you learn how to use this source of power inside of you:You will be motivated to do great work, to create, to bring your ideas to life.You will be motivated to get healthy and vibrant and get in your ideal physical shape.You will be motivated to start that business or write that book.You will be motivated to get out of debt and build your wealth.You will be motivated to be a role model for your family, friends and community.The author takes you through the 8 pillars of motivation to help you push past the resistance that comes up when you want to do the things you crave but still get stuck. As a result, you will become unstoppable as you pursue your desires. In this book, the author tells you about 8 pillars of motivation that have transformed her life as she moved from Iran to Turkey and then to the USA, as she built a successful corporate career only to leave it behind for her true purpose, and as she explores the real power of motivation with you so you can do the same in your life. The 8 pillars show you how to set aside goals and deadlines and milestones and instead, unlock your real potential - what you are really meant to do in life - in a more effortless and natural way.For more on author Farnoosh Brock, check out: prolificliving.com.
title: The 8 Pillars Of Motivation
